text: ( Source : HRW - Human Rights Watch ) ( Jerusalem ) â€“ Israeli forces shot and wounded a research assistant working for Human Rights Watch on October 6, 2015 , as she was observing a demonstration outside Ramallah in the occupied West Bank . She
